snippet: Sirius XM Radio said first-quarter net income rose 15 percent and announced that its interim chief executive, James E. Meyer, was taking over the position permanently.
abstract: Sirius XM Radio reports continued growth for its first quarter and announces that its interim chief executive, James E Meyer, is taking the job permanently; says revenue rose 12 percent to $897 million; net income increased 15 percent to $124 million.
lead_paragraph: Sirius XM Radio said first-quarter net income rose 15 percent and announced that its interim chief executive, James E. Meyer, was taking over the position permanently.

headline.seo: Sirius XM Reports Gains in Income and Subscribers
headline.main: A 15% Gain In Earnings At Sirius XM
